title: ECB backlash intensifies as former central bankers blast policy
text:
The backlash against the European Central Bank’s latest attempts to revive the eurozone intensified today after six former central bankers blasted its stimulus boost.

The group of former European rate-setters, including two ex policymakers at the institution (ECB), warned that its ultra-loose monetary policy is “based on a wrong diagnosis” and could harm financial stability.

They outlined several concerns with the central bank's policies in a memo, arguing they are having negative side effects and threaten the ECB's independence.
